data.rationale:
My module makes easier for Catalyst users to use
    Mail::Builder::Simple in their applications, especially for
    beginners. And Mail::Builder::Simple can be used to send email that
    does automaticly the UTF-8 encoding of headers and body, can create
    easier a text-html multipart body, can add attachments and inline
    images without needing to specify their Content-Type, can create the
    body and the attachments using templates and many of these features
    are not offered by Catalyst::View::Email. Another benefit of my
    module is that the Catalyst users can use the same interface for
    sending email in the Catalyst app and in an external program with
    Mail::Builder::Simple.
